滿載船況: full cargo condition; full load condition

滿載貨: full and complete cargo; full capacity

到付運費: freight at destination; freight at risk; freight payable at destination

裝卸、堆置及平艙自理: free in and out, stowed and trimmed {= FIOST}

裝卸及堆置自理: free in and out, and stowed {= FIOS}

卸貨自理: free discharge {= FD}; free out {= FO}

貨運承攬人收貨單: forwarders certificate of receipt [= Forwarder's cargo receipt] {= FCR}

浮上浮下船舶: float on / float off ship {= FO/FO ship}

整裝貨櫃: FCL or CY container; full container load {= FCL}

碼頭交貨: ex pier; ex quay; ex wharf

工廠交貨: ex factory; Ex works; ex works

伸縮條款: escalator clause; up and down clause
